entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8.0.100-preview fails to build: "rzc generate exited code 1 error" #50670
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50665
  • Update TFM to net9.0 #50662
    .NET 9 Planning
  • AsyncEnumerable response not working as expected #50656
  • Metadata to exclude request from http.server.request.duration metric #50654
  • The value of HostingEnvironment.ApplicationName is incorrect during EF migrations #50649
  • Remove workaround from the Blazor Web App template when WebAssembly is enabled #50646
  • The Client project of the Blazor Web App template should also have a Components folder #50645

Closed

  • Developer exception page renders as plain text in Blazor Web App when doing an enhanced navigation #49571
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #50638
  • Perf improvement: json #50650
  • FolderBrowserDialog crashes WPF Blazor Hybrid apps #49516
    8.0-rc2
  • TagHelpers (asp-controller, asp-action) don't generate link if a Variable is used to set Endpoint Route Pattern #50343
  • CSS isolation does not work - wrong isolation set #50356
  • Debug in Blazor United App #50383
  • Race condition in shared form mapping resolution logic #50464
  • NavigationException raised when using NavigationManager.NavigateTo upon form post in SSR #50478
  • Loop within RenderTreeBuilder causes endless loading #50659
  • Rename Blazor WebAssembly project to Blazor WebAssembly Standalone #50292
    8.0-rc2
  • Align Blazor WebAssembly template content with the Blazor Web App template #50195
    8.0-rc2

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid excessive WellKnownType cache misses in RDG #50669
    area-networking
  • Use ArgumentException.ThrowIfNullOrEmpty #50666
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #50668
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc2
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #50660
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.12
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #50661
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.23
  • Update downlevel SiteExtension versions #50667
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Disable auto-injected CodeQl3000 #50664
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1
  • Hard-code CSharp version to 12.0 #50663
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0-rc2
  • Simplify BoxedStatusCodes storage in HostingMetrics.cs #49332
    area-hosting, 9.0-preview1
  • Clean up route tooling for components #50651
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-preview1
  • Update SDK version #50644
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix incoming connections with same ID sometimes failing incorrectly #50417
    area-signalr
  • Fix dropping messages on reconnect #50409
    area-signalr
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Support injecting keyed services with `[Inject]` #50561
    area-blazor
  • Support resolving IFormFile in complex form mapping #50537
    area-blazor
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #50608
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • SignalR MessageBuffer fixes #50315
    area-signalr
  • Add automated Blazor WebView test using Photino #50347
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix AwaitableSocketAsyncEventArgs reorderings on weaker memory models #50624
    area-networking
  • Persist Prerendered State #50625
    area-blazor
  • Increment HubProtocol version for Stateful Reconnect #50442
    area-signalr
  • Make enhanced nav much more conservative, and better handle redirections #50551
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Error page support for Server Side Rendered Razor Component Applications #50550
    area-blazor
  • Try Adding Suport for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • [release/8.0] [Blazor] Dynamically toggle navigation interception #50564
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] APIs to preserve content between enhanced navigations #50437
    area-blazor
